name: Smart Contracts
description: I leverage my extensive understanding of Ethereum and EVM protocols to design, develop, and optimize decentralized applications (dApps) and smart contracts.

name: Back End
description: My mastery of server-side architecture patterns allows me to create robust, efficient, and scalable back-end systems and flawlessly integrate them with front-end systems.

name: Front End
description: By seamlessly blending aesthetics and functionality, I can craft stunning and highly responsive websites, pixel-perfect layouts, and intuitive interfaces that leave a lasting impression on users.

name: DeFi
description: In addition to my coding prowess, I keeps a vigilant eye on the ever-evolving landscape of DeFi by analyzing market dynamics, anticipating risks, and optimizing financial strategies.

name: Project Mgmt
description: Thanks to my strong technical background and results driven approach, I am excellent in planning and executing complex projects while proactively managing risks.
